plugins.name: Rename Frames - ID generator - Scrum
plugins.description:
Key features:

- Generates unique IDs for your selected frames

- Naming structure: section-project-00000 (5 random digits)

- Intuitive and easy-to-use interface


How it works:

1. Select the frames you want to name

2. Open the plugin and fill in the fields:

- Section: Define the part of the project (e.g., "home", "about", "products")

- Project Nomenclature: Enter your project's code or abbreviation

3. Click "Generate" and you're done! Your selected frames will have new unique names


Perfect for:

- Maintaining consistent nomenclature in large projects

- Facilitating collaboration in design teams

- Improving organization and workflow in Figma


Streamline your workflow and keep your Figma files organized with Frame ID Generator.
plugins.tagline: Frame ID Generator is a plugin that simplifies and standardizes the process of naming your frames.

plugins.name: Optimizely - Content Type Builder
plugins.description:
This plugin helps Optimizely CMS marketers and editors to create content types including pages, blocks and components directly from your Figma visuals to Optimizely CMS.


  1. Suitable for Optimizely Saas Headless CMS
  2. Support for Visual Builder to create elements from Figma
  3. Create your content type from Figma design to CMS instead of creating those manually
  4. Automatic mapping of Figma design node type to CMS data type for properties.
plugins.tagline: Create Optimizely CMS content types directly from your Figma visuals

99330.name: Optimizely - Content Type Builder
99330.description:
This plugin helps Optimizely CMS marketers and editors to create content types including pages, blocks and components directly from your Figma visuals to Optimizely CMS.

  2. Support for Visual Builder to create elements from Figma
  3. Create your content type from Figma design to CMS instead of creating those manually
  4. Automatic mapping of Figma design node type to CMS data type for properties.
99330.tagline: Create Optimizely CMS content types directly from your Figma visuals

• Change all colors at once, by hue groups, or tweak individual swatches

• See & organize visible colors from your selection


Saves you the hassle of changing colors everywhere manually.


⚡ Works with fills, strokes, gradients & effects.

🌈 Great for cleaning up messy files or exploring fresh palettes

plugins.name: scale_One-click adaptation to device screen
plugins.description:
This plug-in can help designers adapt their designs to devices of different sizes with one click.


1. Automatic layout adjustment:

Automatically adjust left and right and top and bottom layouts according to different size ratios

- Automatically detect horizontal or vertical layout direction

- Adjust element spacing and padding according to layout direction

- Maintain the overall structure and visual balance of the design


2. Intelligent size detection and customization:

- Analyze all design draft sizes on the current page

- Identify the most commonly used sizes and recommend them to users

- Built-in common device sizes (iPhone, iPad, Web, etc.)

- Support adding custom sizes, customizable names and sizes


3. One-click export:

After generating the manuscript, you can export all illustrations with one click and add size information to the name

- Automatically set export options, including size information

- Support batch export of all adapted design drafts

- Automatically include size information in file naming for easy management


该插件可以帮助设计师一键将设计稿适配到不同尺寸的设备上。


1. 自动调整布局：

根据不同的尺寸比例自动调整左右和上下布局

- 自动检测水平或垂直布局方向

- 根据布局方向调整元素间距和内边距

- 保持设计的整体结构和视觉平衡


2. 尺寸智能检测与自定义：

- 分析当前页面中的所有设计稿尺寸

- 识别最常用的尺寸并推荐给用户

- 内置常见设备尺寸（iPhone、iPad、Web等）

- 支持添加自定义尺寸，可自定义名称和尺寸大小


3. 一键导出：

生成稿件后可以一键导出所有配图并在命名中加入尺寸信息

- 自动设置导出选项，包含尺寸信息

- 支持批量导出所有适配后的设计稿

- 文件命名中自动包含尺寸信息，方便管理
plugins.tagline: Ability to scale designs to multiple sizes, and lock scaling rules for design elements

plugins.name: 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant
plugins.description:
Introduction

Slice Export Assistant is a powerful Figma plugin designed specifically for designers to efficiently export selected design elements. Whether you're working on web designs, mobile applications, or icon creation, Slice Export Assistant caters to your diverse needs.


Function Description

  1. Multiple Format Support: Export your designs in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP.
  2. Multi-Scale Exporting: Easily set different export scales with automatic increments to save your time.
  3. Custom Suffixes: Assign custom suffixes to each exported file to ensure consistent and organized file naming.
  4. Batch Exporting: Export multiple files at once and automatically generate a ZIP archive for easy downloading and management.
  5. WEBP Conversion: Built-in WEBP format conversion to enhance image optimization efficiency.


How to Use

  1. Select Elements: In Figma, select one or more design elements you wish to export.
  2. Run the Plugin: Right-click on the selected elements, navigate to Plugins > Slice Export Assistant > Export.


Configure Options

  1. Choose Format: Select the desired export format from PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, or WEBP.
  2. Set Scale and Suffix: Add the required export scales. Each time you click the "Add" button, the scale automatically increments.
  3. Customize Suffixes: Modify or remove suffixes as needed to fit your naming conventions.
  4. Export: Click the Export button. The plugin will export the files based on your settings—downloading single files directly or packaging multiple files into a ZIP archive for download.


Precautions

  1. Ensure Correct Selection: Make sure to select the elements you want to export on the canvas; otherwise, the plugin cannot perform the export.
  2. Browser Compatibility: WEBP format conversion relies on the browser's Canvas support. Ensure your browser is compatible.
  3. File Naming: When customizing suffixes, avoid using special characters to ensure the validity of file names.


介绍

切图助手是一款强大的Figma插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您高效地导出选中的设计元素。无论是网页设计、移动应用还是图标制作，切图助手都能满足您的多样化需求。


功能说明

  1. 多格式支持：支持导出PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF和WEBP等多种格式。
  2. 多倍数导出：轻松设置不同的导出倍数，并自动递增，节省您的时间。
  3. 自定义后缀：为每个导出文件设置自定义后缀，确保文件命名规范。
  4. 批量导出：支持一次导出多个文件，并自动生成ZIP压缩包，方便下载和管理。
  5. WEBP转换：内置WEBP格式转换功能，提升图片优化效率。


使用方法

  1. 选择元素：在Figma中选择一个或多个需要导出的设计元素。
  2. 运行插件：右键点击选择的元素，导航至Plugins > 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant > Export。


设置选项

  1. 选择格式：从PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF或WEBP中选择导出格式。
  2. 设置倍数和后缀：添加所需的导出倍数，每次点击“添加”按钮，倍数自动递增。
  3. 自定义后缀：根据需要修改或删除后缀内容。
  4. 导出：点击导出按钮，插件将根据设置导出文件，单文件直接下载，多文件打包为ZIP下载。


注意事项

  1. 确保选择正确：请先在画布上选中要导出的元素，否则插件无法执行导出操作。
  2. 浏览器支持：WEBP格式转换依赖于浏览器的Canvas支持，请确保您的浏览器兼容。
  3. 文件命名：自定义后缀时，请避免使用特殊字符，以确保文件名的有效性。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Flexible Multi-Scale Slice Exporting

plugins.name: VariableSlider
plugins.description: VariableSlider is a Figma plugin designed for real-time layout refinement. Effortlessly adjust local variables with a dynamic slider that lets you fine-tune values precisely. Define a custom number sequence, and seamlessly switch between steps to achieve the ideal design balance. Perfect for designers who need quick and flexible control over spacing, sizing, and other layout parameters.

accepted.name: Roland Hidvegi

plugins.name: Orange Tokens: Themes & Variables
plugins.description:
🔶 Orange Tokens

Generate Figma Variables, Text Styles & System Docs for Color & Typography — Instantly


Orange Tokens turns your base colors and typography into a complete, scalable design system — directly inside Figma.

Generate smart color variables, structured typography tokens, synced text styles, and brand documentation in just one click.


No more guesswork, manual tweaking, or broken overrides. Whether you're building a new system or scaling across themes and brands, Orange Tokens helps you move fast — and stay consistent.


🚀 How It Works

  1. Enter your base colors and name them.
  2. Choose how many display/text styles you need.
  3. Click “Generate Variables.”
  4. Done — color variables, text styles, and a full Brandbook are created instantly.


✨ Core Features

  1. One-click generation of design tokens from base colors
  2. Smart tints & shades with accessible contrast built-in
  3. Typography tokens + Figma Text Styles auto-generated
  4. Brandbook: View and document your entire color + type system in one page
  5. Auto-detects existing variables and updates them non-destructively
  6. Clean token naming that’s system-ready
  7. Works with Figma’s Variables API — perfect for theming, dark mode, and token-based workflows.


📘 What's New

  1. Typography Docs Generation
  2. Integrated Brandbook View to preview and document all variables
  3. Editable Primitives: Auto-detect and modify existing Figma Variables
  4. Improved Performance & Naming Structure
  5. Optimized for design systems, enterprise teams, and multi-theme setups


💬 Feedback & Roadmap

This is just the start. Upcoming features: typography token customization, spacing tokens, light/dark mode toggles, and advanced export options.


Got an idea or request? Drop a comment on the plugin page or reach out at orangetokens.figma@gmail.com.
plugins.tagline: Create color & typography variables, styles, and docs effortlessly

plugins.name: Select Options
plugins.description:
Select layers based on

  1. Step Selection: Choose every nth item.
  2. Random Selection: Select items based on a percentage probability.
  3. Similar Items Selection: Find and select items with matching type, styles, or variables (e.g., text style, fill style).


Streamline your design workflow with precise selection capabilities!
plugins.tagline: Select layers based on Step Selection, Random Selection and Similar Items Selection.

116009.name: Select Options
116009.description:
Select layers based on

  1. Step Selection: Choose every nth item.
  2. Random Selection: Select items based on a percentage probability.

Streamline your design workflow with precise selection capabilities!
116009.tagline: Select layers based on Step Selection, Random Selection and Similar Items Selection.

plugins.name: AutoDoc
plugins.description:
Auto Generic documentation to get you started

This plugin provides generic documentation that goes directly into a component description to get you started documenting your design system.

1. Click main component

2. Generate documentation

3. Look at the components description

This will not override any existing documentation it will put it on the bottom

plugins.name: Text to Sequence
plugins.description:
Text to Sequence automatically converts selected text layers to sequential numbers in a Z-pattern flow. Perfect for document page numbers. Simply select text layers and choose your preferred numbering style: standard numbers, padded numbers (01, 02...), or letters (a,b,c... / A,B,C...). You can also set a custom starting number.


選択したテキストレイヤーをZの字順に連続した番号に変換します。資料のページ番号を振る際に活躍します。テキストレイヤーを選択し、お好みの連番スタイルを選択してください。
plugins.tagline: Quick Z-pattern numbering for your text layers.

130144.name: Text to Sequence
130144.description:
Text to Sequence automatically converts selected text layers to sequential numbers in a Z-pattern flow. Perfect for document page numbers. Simply select text layers and choose your preferred numbering style: standard numbers, padded numbers (01, 02...), or letters (a,b,c... / A,B,C...). You can also set a custom starting number.

130144.tagline: Quick Z-pattern numbering for your text layers.

plugins.name: Moospire
plugins.description:
Description for Moospire Figma Plugin;

Moospire’s Figma plugin is designed to revolutionize how you create and curate moodboards. Whether you're sourcing inspiration from the web or harnessing the power of AI to bring your unique visions to life, this plugin is ideal for designers seeking an efficient way to visualize and consolidate design concepts directly within your Figma projects.


What to Expect from the Moospire Figma Plugin

1. Seamless Web Curation:

This feature allows you to explore and curate moodboards by compiling the most inspiring and relevant content found across the web. Whether you're looking for design trends, color schemes, or visual ideas, Moospire makes it easy to gather these elements directly into your Figma workspace.


2. AI-Powered Creation:

Transform your thoughts into beautifully cohesive moodboards with just a few clicks. Submit your concepts via text, images, sketches, or even voice notes, and watch as Moospire’s AI effortlessly crafts these inputs into structured moodboards. This feature is particularly beneficial for capturing the essence of spontaneous ideas and turning them into actionable designs.


How to Use the Moospire Figma Plugin

Installation: Begin by installing the Moospire plugin from the Figma plugin store.

Launching Moospire: Access Moospire directly within your Figma project by navigating to the plugin section and selecting Moospire.

Searching and Curating: Use the search feature to find web content or let Moospire suggest materials based on search & past preferences.

Creating with AI: Upload your creative inputs through the plugin’s interface, and specify the type of moodboard content you need. The AI will process your inputs and generate a moodboard ideas right within your Figma canvas.
plugins.tagline: The Spark you need to create

plugins.name: FigJam Stickies Export
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for exporting FigJam data, and it has the following capabilities:

  1. It supports exporting FigJam stickies as CSV or Excel files.
  2. It supports categorizing data according to Sections.
  3. Currently, it does not support Section nesting.
  4. It supports exporting the entire file or the selection.

Come and try using this plugin! If there is anything that could be improved, you are welcome to provide your feedback!
plugins.tagline: A plugin for exporting FigJam data group by Section

plugins.name: UIDraft: Material Preview
plugins.description:
Live Web Preview for Figma

See your designs come alive in real web environments – directly within Figma.


Functional Overview

  1. View Figma frame/group/components as they’ll appear in actual browsers
  2. Auto-converts Figma styles to CSS custom properties hierarchy


How to Use

  1. Choose any frame/group/component node in your Figma file


Operational Constraints

  1. Backgrounds using Figma's CROP fill mode might display unexpected aspect ratios
  2. Complex boolean operations may simplify during web preview rendering
  3. Any layer with rotation ≠0° may render with unexpected alignment.
plugins.tagline: Figma to Live Web Preview in One Click: Skip Handoffs, Boost Workflow

134036.name: UIDraft: Material Preview
134036.description:

  2. Complex boolean operations may simplify during web preview rendering
  3. Any layer with rotation ≠0° may render with unexpected alignment.
134036.tagline: Figma to Live Web Preview in One Click: Skip Handoffs, Boost Workflow

plugins.name: Gradient Replacer
plugins.description:
Gradient Replacer


Helps you clean up your designs by converting gradients to solid colors with intelligent options. Perfect for simplifying designs, improving handoff, or meeting brand guidelines.


🚀 Key features:


  1. Convert all gradients on a page or just selected elements
  2. Three smart conversion options:
  3. Pick from the predefined palette
  4. Use the dominant color from each gradient
  5. Choose your own custom color
  6. Batch process multiple gradients at once
  7. Preserves original opacity values
  8. Works with all gradient types (linear, radial, angular, and diamond)


🧐 How to use:


  1. Select elements or leave unselected to process entire page
  2. Choose your preferred conversion method
  3. Click "Replace Gradients" to convert


Pro tip: Use the dominant color option to maintain the closest match to your original designs.


–––––––––––


🙌 Enjoy!

Like my stuff? Consider buying me a coffee (BMAC or Ko-fi) so I can develop more projects 😘 ☕️

accepted.name: Darek
accepted.description: Designer and developer who loves experimenting and creating cool things.

plugins.tagline: Convert gradients to solid colors with smart options

plugins.name: Doctip.me
plugins.description:
Doctip.me helps building, maintaining and managing the functional specification of a project whose requirements are driven by the UI.


Doctip.me will help you to


  1. Ensure that while documenting the interface nothing is missed and save time on back and forth between the dev team and product team

plugins.name: Batch Description Update
plugins.description:
Adding a description to your Figma's components brings some benefits. When it comes to icons, adding terms and tags can help users find icons in the asset panel. However, maintaining component descriptions can be a lot of work, especially for a long set of icons. This plugin allows users to update all component descriptions with three clicks.

  • Create a .CSV file where the first column is the component name and the second is the desired description;
  • Run the plugin 'Batch Description Update', select the .CSV file, and run the process;
  • Done! Your components have their descriptions updated in no time.
plugins.tagline: Update component description in batch through a .CSV file

80319.name: Batch Description Update
80319.description:
Adding a description to your Figma's components brings some benefits. When it comes to icons, adding terms and tags can help users find icons in the asset panel. However, maintaining component descriptions can be a lot of work, especially for a long set of icons. This plugin allows users to update all component descriptions with three clicks.

  • Create a .CSV file where the first column is the component name and the second is the desired description;
  • Run the plugin 'Batch Description Update', select the .CSV file, and run the process;
  • Done! Your components have their descriptions updated in no time.
80319.tagline: Update component description in batch through a .CSV file

plugins.name: Tinte
plugins.description:
Intro

Create stunning colour palettes or find perfect colour combinations especially the right shades of greys, tailor-made for every project in seconds.


Whether you're starting out, especially if you’re starting out or a seasoned pro, use Tinte to generate colours, shades and all the greys you need for your projects — websites, apps etc. 


And with Tinte, you get the Hex, HSL and RGB codes.


How to Use?

You can use Tinte in two ways;


1. If you have a base colour code, just input the colour code in to the text prompt and Tinte will do the rest.


2. If you don’t have a colour code, don’t worry, you can still use Tinte. All you have to do is provide some information about your project and Tinte will have options for you in seconds. 


Privacy

We do not retain or store your palettes. 


Support

This is the first version of Tinte, so please leave us all your feedback and support. We will appreciate it.


If you face any issues or want to request for features, please let us know in the comments or by filling this form.
plugins.tagline: Create stunning colour palettes, tailor-made for every project in seconds.

plugins.name: Multi Text Edit
plugins.description:
Edit multiple text elements in a single text editor


Very helpful for bulk text editing, or ask an LLM for a list of dummy content to paste into the text editor.


Docs

  1. Update Text - each line of the text editor a selected text node in the selected X, Y, or Z order. Shortcut: press Cmd+Enter/Ctrl+Enter while in the typing to 'Update Text.'
  2. Pull Text - fills the text editor with the content of the selected text elements, so you can edit existing text and update it.
  3. Left to Right (X) - fills the leftmost text elements first. Falls back to 'Top to Bottom (Y)' if X values are equal.
  4. Top to Bottom (Y) - fills the topmost text elements first. Falls back to 'Left to Right (X)' if Y values are equal.
  5. Layer order (Z) - fills text elements in the order they appear in the Layers panel.


Tip: Precisely select nested text elements using "Ctrl+Click Drag" to draw a box through a set of text elements. See Figma Docs "Selection Marquee 4." for details.


This plugin was inspired by Multiple Text Editor's "List to Layers" functionality. You might try this other plugin if you'd like to generate random content for text elements in a similar way.


Github Repo
plugins.tagline: Edit multiple text elements in a single text editor

108579.name: Multi Text Edit
108579.description:
Edit multiple text elements in a single text editor


Very helpful for bulk text editing, or ask an LLM for a list of dummy content to paste into the text editor.


Docs

  1. Update Text - each line of the text editor a selected text node in the selected X, Y, or Z order. Shortcut: press Cmd+Enter/Ctrl+Enter while in the typing to 'Update Text.'
  2. Pull Text - fills the text editor with the content of the selected text elements, so you can edit existing text and update it.
  3. Left to Right (X) - fills the leftmost text elements first. Falls back to 'Top to Bottom (Y)' if X values are equal.
  4. Top to Bottom (Y) - fills the topmost text elements first. Falls back to 'Left to Right (X)' if Y values are equal.
  5. Layer order (Z) - fills text elements in the order they appear in the Layers panel.


Tip: Precisely select nested text elements using "Ctrl+Click Drag" to draw a box through a set of text elements. See Figma Docs "Selection Marquee 4." for details.


This plugin was inspired by Multiple Text Editor's "List to Layers" functionality. You might try this other plugin if you'd like to generate random content for text elements in a similar way.


Github Repo
108579.release_notes: Persist window size, add error message, add `ctrl+Enter` submit shortcut
108579.tagline: Edit multiple text elements in a single text editor

plugins.name: MEMO | シンプルなメモ帳
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、ファイルごとに個人用のメモを残せるシンプルなメモ帳です。


こんな時におすすめ


コメントが溢れてしまったプロジェクトで

必要なコメントだけをピックアップして残したいときに、コメントのリンクをメモして整理できます。


ページ数が多いプロジェクトで

後回しにした作業場所をすぐに見つけたいときに、その場所のリンクをメモしておけます。


他の人からまとめてリンクを共有されたとき

コメントやフレームのリンクをこのメモに貼り付けておけば、クリック一つでその場所にスムーズに移動できます。外部メモやチャットからFigma内リンクを開くと、ブラウザを経由して遅れることが多いですが、このプラグインならタイムラグなしで移動可能です。特にクライアントに画面共有しながら説明する際などに便利です。
plugins.tagline: このプラグインは、Figma 内でメモを取り、タブでメモを切り替えることができる機能を持っています。

plugins.name: Text Filler
plugins.description:
🔍 Plug-in Overview

Quickly fill each line of text in the input box into the selected text layer, helping to save time ⏳.


📌 Introduction to use

  1. Use Apple Shortcuts to quickly extract text from images.
  2. Paste the extracted text into the textarea.
  3. Select the target text layer.
  4. Click "Apply" and wait for the text to fill in (each line will correspond to a separate text layer).


📩 Contact us

Contact us if you have any problem or suggestion:

fansanqiu@gmail.com



🔍 插件概览

快速将输入框中的每一行文本填写到选定的文字层中，帮助节省时间 ⏳。


📌 使用介绍

  1. 使用苹果捷径快速识别图片中的文字；
  2. 将文字填入到输入框中；
  3. 选择文字图层；
  4. 应用并等待填入（每行对应一个文本图层）。


📩 联系我们

如果您有任何问题或建议，请联系我们：

fansanqiu@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Quickly fill each line from the textarea into the selected text layer.

plugins.name: Layer Duplicator Pro
plugins.description:
Layer Duplicator Pro


Layer Duplicator Pro is an innovative plugin for Figma designed to streamline the process of duplicating and modifying design layers using data from Excel spreadsheets. Whether you're managing complex design projects or iterating on prototypes, this tool enhances efficiency and accuracy by integrating structured data seamlessly into your Figma workspace.


Main Features:

  1. Effortless Integration: Import data directly from Excel into Figma to duplicate layers and apply modifications swiftly.
  2. Structured Data Handling: Manage detailed information about design layers through Excel, ensuring precise replication and edits.
  3. Visual Representation: Review and validate changes clearly within Figma, enhancing collaboration and decision-making.
  4. Enhanced Workflow: Optimize design iterations by leveraging Excel's organizational capabilities directly within Figma.


How to Use:

  1. Download Data: Extract specific details from layers into an Excel file. First, select the layer you wish to duplicate. An Excel file with the necessary structure will be automatically generated and downloaded.
  2. Import and Duplicate: Once the automatically generated Excel file has been downloaded, generate rows corresponding to each element that will be duplicated based on the selected layer. You can modify these elements by editing the corresponding columns in the Excel file. Layer Duplicator Pro will automatically adjust the indicated parameters and create a duplicated layer with the desired dimensions.
  3. Review Results: Efficiently validate changes and errors through intuitive visual feedback within Figma.


Benefits:

  1. Increased Productivity: Simplify complex design tasks and accelerate project timelines.
  2. Improved Collaboration: Foster better teamwork by visualizing changes and updates clearly.
  3. Streamlined Processes: Eliminate manual duplication efforts and streamline iterative design workflows.


Next Steps:

Explore how Layer Duplicator Pro can revolutionize your design process by integrating structured data seamlessly from Excel into Figma. Enhance productivity and creativity with a tool designed to simplify and elevate your design workflow.
plugins.tagline: Duplicate, resize, edit text & images swiftly in Figma for streamlined design workflows.

plugins.name: Sortup: Flexible sorting
plugins.description:
🗂️ Sort layers, frames and sections on the page horizontally and vertically, taking into account the name and status in Figma & Jam.


🚀 Quick commands:

• All - sorts all objects without selection by horizontal;

• Horizontal - sorts selected objects by horizontal;

• Vertical - sorts selected objects vertically;


✅ The plugin will sort objects by increasing values, by alphabet and by repeating words.
plugins.tagline: Flexible sorting in Figma & Jam

103590.name: Sortup: Flexible sorting
103590.description:
🗂️ Sort layers, frames and sections on the page horizontally and vertically, taking into account the name and status in Figma & Jam.


🚀 Quick commands:

• All - sorts all objects without selection by horizontal;

• Horizontal - sorts selected objects by horizontal;

• Vertical - sorts selected objects vertically;


✅ The plugin will sort objects by increasing values, by alphabet and by repeating words.

plugins.name: Clean layers
plugins.description:
With Clean layers, you're able to find unnamed layers, components, and stray instances (which are component instances that no longer have a parent component), helping you maintain a clean file that's properly organized and synced.


This makes your design workflow smoother and ensures your files are easy to navigate and collaborate on.
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin that helps clean up your layers and components.

116437.name: Clean layers
116437.description:
With Clean layers, you're able to find unnamed layers, components, and stray instances (which are component instances that no longer have a parent component), helping you maintain a clean file that's properly organized and synced.


This makes your design workflow smoother and ensures your files are easy to navigate and collaborate on.
116437.release_notes: fix issue where find component could not find components nested in sections + it showed all instances
116437.tagline: A Figma plugin that helps clean up your layers and components.

plugins.name: Color Control
plugins.description:
Color Control simplifies color adjustments by visualizing the HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness, and Alpha) color model and providing precise control over color properties.


Simply select an object, modify its fill or stroke using the HSL sliders, and see your changes applied instantly.
plugins.tagline: A more intuitive way to refine colors

103980.tagline: A more intuitive way to refine colors

plugins.name: 中英文大鸟转转转
plugins.description:
大鸟转转转插件可以自动检测选定的 Figma 框架中的中文和英文文本，并分别应用相应的排版属性。用户可以设置字体、字号、字重、字间距、行高、段落间距、文本大小写和文本装饰等，确保不同语言的文本风格一致。插件非常适合需要在设计中统一管理中英文文本格式的用户，提升排版效率。


Big Bird Text Formatter plugin automatically detects Chinese and English text in selected Figma frames and applies separate typography attributes. Users can customize font, font size, font weight, letter spacing, line height, paragraph spacing, text case, and text decoration to maintain consistent styles for different languages. This plugin is perfect for users who need to manage both Chinese and English text formatting in their designs efficiently.
plugins.tagline: Streamline Chinese & English text formatting in Figma with smart optimization and style controls

114682.name: 中英文大鸟转转转
114682.description:
大鸟转转转插件可以自动检测选定的 Figma 框架中的中文和英文文本，并分别应用相应的排版属性。用户可以设置字体、字号、字重、字间距、行高、段落间距、文本大小写和文本装饰等，确保不同语言的文本风格一致。插件非常适合需要在设计中统一管理中英文文本格式的用户，提升排版效率。


Big Bird Text Formatter plugin automatically detects Chinese and English text in selected Figma frames and applies separate typography attributes. Users can customize font, font size, font weight, letter spacing, line height, paragraph spacing, text case, and text decoration to maintain consistent styles for different languages. This plugin is perfect for users who need to manage both Chinese and English text formatting in their designs efficiently.

manifest.name: 中英文大鸟转转转 Big Bird Text Formatter

114682.tagline: Streamline Chinese & English text formatting in Figma with smart optimization and style controls

plugins.name: Group Overlapping Layers
plugins.description: Group Overlapping Elements is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your design workflow by automatically grouping selected elements that overlap with each other. Simply select the elements you want to analyze, run the plugin, and it will create groups of overlapping layers, making it easier to organize and manage your design. Ideal for designers who need to quickly organize complex layouts or group related design elements
plugins.tagline: Automatically group overlapping layers

99271.name: Group Overlapping Layers
99271.description: Group Overlapping Elements is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your design workflow by automatically grouping selected elements that overlap with each other. Simply select the elements you want to analyze, run the plugin, and it will create groups of overlapping layers, making it easier to organize and manage your design. Ideal for designers who need to quickly organize complex layouts or group related design elements

plugins.name: Reablocks Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
Reablocks Figma Plugin

Plugin utilities to supercharge your dev work for reablocks (an open-source repo containing a set of enterprise UI components for React).


Features

CSS Token Generator: Generate Reablock-compatible JSON from Figma Style variables


CSS Token Generator Usage


Pre-requisite

You should have style created for all colors that you want to use in the project

You should use the following naming convention to assign style property to your colors

E.g.: 'Primary', 'Brand', 'Primary/100', 'Brand/title black 100'``


# Running Plugin

- Go to the Figma design file where you want to use the plugin

- Use `CMD + p` to open quick menu

- Search for new plugins using "Find More plugins option" and search for "Reablocks Figma Plugin"

- Once found, click on run plugin, it will open a popup

- Click on "Generate CSS"

- Click on "Copy CSS"

- Use the copied CSS tokens to your project


Development guide

Check the readme file @ https://github.com/reaviz/reablocks-figma-plugin/blob/main/README.md for dev contribution guidelines
plugins.tagline: Your Figma companion for Reablock

plugins.name: Free AI Chatbot
plugins.description:
🧠 Design with AI. Just Type.


Supercharge your Figma workflow with an intuitive AI assistant that understands natural language.

✨ What You Can Do


💬 Type to Design – “Make the button blue”, “Add an image below” — AI gets it done.


✏️ Edit Instantly – Modify components, text, colors, and layout in seconds.


🚀 Rapid Prototyping – Go from idea to interface without dragging or clicking.


🔄 Smart Iteration – Refine designs with short prompts like “Make it more minimal.”


🌐 OpenRouter AI – Choose your preferred model, configure your API, and work your way.


🔓 Free & Pro Features


✅ Free: Access basic commands and design edits


💎 Pro: Unlock advanced AI models and deep customization


⚙️ Flexible Settings


📌 Select your AI model (GPT-4, Claude, etc.)


🔑 Add your API key via OpenRouter


🖌️ Why Use This Plugin?


Save time ⏱️


Skip repetitive tasks 🔁


Focus on creativity 🎨


Let AI handle the heavy lifting 🤖

accepted.name: sadik sajid
accepted.description: Hi, I'm sadik sajid — a passionate designer crafting intuitive and visually engaging digital experiences. I specialize in user interfaces, design systems

plugins.tagline: Your design co-pilot in Figma. Just type it, and AI will make it real.

plugins.name: Image Size Checker
plugins.description: Image Size Checker helps you instantly check the size of any image in your Figma design. Select an image, and the plugin will display its size in KB or MB. Ideal for optimizing images and managing file sizes effectively.
plugins.tagline: Quickly check the size of any image in KB or MB within Figma
